name: Android.andrew
tagline: Modified,tutorial codes on android based on developer.android.com
body:
### Hi.You are on FlowSight Github Page
##To View Repos [Click Here](https://github.com/FlowSight/android.andrew)

This Page is intended for android beginners.To help,collaborate with them on learning various topics as they go through the official tutorial [here](http://developer.android.com/).



Code samples are uploaded for simple Image capture and video capturing demo.Code to display MIME files(audio,video) listing on the devices will be uploaded shortly.

#You are MOST welcome to contribute,discuss,make change,provide suggestions!

## Authors and Contributors
Anirban Mitra(@FlowSight) as of now.   
*would love to see more names coming*

### Support or Contact
Email me: *adreamspark@gmail.com*  

[**Twitter**](https://twitter.com/anbanmta)  

[**Google+**](https://plus.google.com/u/0/+AnirbanMitraAndrew)
